polite_form: ありがとうございます (arigatou gozaimasu)

example.japanese: ありがとう、手伝ってくれて！

related_expressions.expression: どうもありがとうございます

cultural_tip: In Japan, people often bow slightly when saying “ありがとう” to show politeness and gratitude.
grammar_note: “Arigatou” is an expression, not a verb. It’s used after receiving help, kindness, or gifts.
